text:
Message 831 of 4024
I just recognized what I find difficult about your emails. The ask is often buried in a long discussion of complaints and feelings. The list below is
helpful as I can see exactly what is outstanding, but when surrounded by extra words that are unhelpful, the focus moves away.
Ask for future emails to be concise about ask without superfluous language.
RO language. I’ll need to review. I assume you discussed with lawyer and agreed to content,
Dr. Brown. I suggested to reach out and request engagement to assist on how to navigate this situation, with her individual speaking with You, myself,
Adrian and Elsa. I disagree what was in The letter for how we use her reccomendations as it should be for guidance only, and my lawyer will respond
to Lisa.
Running list discussion. I am not comfortable with a call at this time.
Path to normalization is with assistance of Dr. Brown.
BofA account. It is a joint account as I understand we both access. You were to set up your own account. I have not seen boys money from Beth
deposited into their accounts but I assumed you cashed, paid off credit card for Bend bills (700 flight charge was actually booked to my Amex as your
delta account defaulted to my Amex which has now been updated) and were going to transfer money to boys account for their Christmas gifts.
I could not time discovery of cameras and subsequent steps I need to take to ensure safety. I don’t control your actions that needed to be address. It’s
unfortunate Lisa is unavailable to help you navigate. .
SAAS we had discussions you would reach out and apparently told Adrian you had. When he told me you had and asked about response that’s when
I started asking you and you never responded. I have not reached out to Jonathan yet but plan to do so so he has an email Monday am. If you disagree
let me know and proposed next steps
Xfinity. Noted you have confirmed alerts have stopped. If they reappear my expectation is that you will inform me. I will ask my lawyer to formalize
that request to Lisa.
Going to engage with the group now and enjoy whistler.
Hope the basketball game goes well. I’m sure Joe and team is grateful for you to step in.
.
Sent:01/27/2024 at 07:40 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/27/2024 at 10:43 AM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Outstanding Issues Fork>>
Message 832 of 4024
It’s the only way I am allowed to communicate with Mom so wanted to check.
Sent:01/28/2024 at 02:52 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Adrian Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Max Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Do you guys get these?
